dct_description_sm: Map of ancient Italy with Latin place names. Relief shown by hachures. In upper margin: 15. Probably issued in: Atlas élémentaire simplifié de géographie ancienne et moderne / par E. Soulier (de Suave) et J. Andriveau-Goujon. Paris : Chez J. Andriveau-Goujon, 1841. The firm of Andriveau-Goujon was located at rue du Bac no. 17 from 1841-1850. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: À Paris : Chez J. Andriveau-Goujon, éditeur, Rue du Bac, no. 17, [1841?]
